data.name: Dare Token
data.description:
Motivation :

Research suggests about 70% of the views on YouTube and other content sites originate from mobile devices. The content and streaming market according to “grandviewresearch.com” is an estimated $59billion. Besides the rapid increase in population of active smart users, most people like to play around, throw a few challenges or participate in some private or mass challenges either in person or over the internet. We go into bets and dares with another party or group of people. In most instances, do we get rewarded for participating in challenges or dares? What happens to biases by third parties and regulations?


Why Daretoken?

DareToken is a revolutionary P2P-platform that drives participation in challenges and online competitions. We are not trying to create an entire blockchain or another bitcoin. We simply want to bridge the gap between the world and blockchain technology by creating a tool for mass adoption. Our platform will enable each participant to launch and accept challenges and competition, provide video footage and other forms of proof of contents and get ratings and rewards based on the results and community voting systems. With a total and max supply of 800million tokens, DRE will be used as a native currency to fuel all platform features, in-app purchases, reward schemes and for partaking in personal, private and mass challenges. Team and advisor tokens will be locked for two years in order to ensure all deliverables are met before tokens are unlocked.


Who are the founders? 

Founded by Roland Quaye, A certified application consultant with Sage South Africa, Middle East and SAP employee central academy. A blockchain advocate and influencer in his local community, an investor, trader and implementer with over 6 years experience in the cryptocurrency industry. Our advisors are made up of LEAD WALLET CEO and the Associate Product Manager of Jam City.


Daretoken will function mainly in these sectors:

Fun and Games — Have fun with your friends and other users of the platform

Monetization of content — Make money from uploading contents and proof of challenges/competitions

Passive income from staking— Stake your Dare token, BNB, USDT etc and earn passive income from completed dares and reward systems through platform commission distribution

Easy and efficient Cash Out — Cash out rewards to fiat payment systems or to your crypto wallet

Participate in ongoing group and mass challenges, become famous and also earn money


What makes Daretoken unique?

Based on research gathered from biteable.com and statista.com the funtech markets has a lot of untapped potential which we will focus on harnessing using blockchain as the backbone of operations. Users will not only focus on the financial markets but also have fun and also earn some money through our reward schemes and competition ranges.
